name: Buissons - Supporter Edition
description:
THIS IS THE SUPPORTER EDITION

This is a slightly higher priced version of Buissons (9$ on Steam). Buissons took me more than  one year to make,  so a big thank you to every person who will buy this supporter edition . This version will give you access to:

  • A DRM free version of the game, Windows only
  • A Steam key for Windows and Mac
  • The very first Windows prototype of the game, with the old art direction
  • Buissons OST, with exclusive unused musics
  • Concepts arts
  • Marketing assets, like wallpapers and such

Hide and Seek with bushes

Take control of a bush and challenge your friends in a hide and seek game up to 4 players (at least 2 players required). Move when the night is dark and use the day as an opportunity to observe and flush out your opponents. Use the secrets of nature to your advantage and prepare for surprises: each game comes with a new forest of its own. Only one bush will survive... And do not forget to drop a fart from time to time, after all it's a lethal weapon.

You and your friends will laugh!
  • A unique hide and seek game mixing action, observation and humor.
  • Easy to play, there is only one button to fart. But only the most observants will win!
  • Charming characters and settings, drawn and animated by hand
  • Buissons is a 2 to 4 players competitive local game. But you can use services such as “Steam Remote Play Together”* or “Parsec” to play with your friends online, for free!
Only the best will win
  • Each game comes with a new randomly generated forest!
  • 4 ecosystems with their own dangers to master and turn against your opponents.
  • A really quick day and night cycle that makes you act and think under pressure
  • The more you train, the more bushes you can add to a game to increase its difficulty
The Team
  • Géraud Zucchini: code, art, design, sounds
  • Antoine Druaux: music, additional sounds

*Steam Remote Play is not functionning on Mac, sorry!
